description: Generated when a cluster member is added

Summary.eval: ($v2 eq '') ? 'New member added to cluster' : 'Host $v2 added to cluster'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SVRCLU-MIB::svrCluMemberAdded SVRCLU-MIB::svrCluMemberIndex i 9999 SVRCLU-MIB::svrCluMemberName s EXAMPLE

description: A unique index for the entry. Values of svrCluMemberIndex must
remain constant at least between reboots of the network management
system on the managed node. Where possible, this value should
reflect the system's native member identifier.
variables.name: SVRCLU-MIB::svrCluMemberIndex

description: The host name of this cluster member. A zero-length value means
the member's host name is unknown. This name may not necessarily
variables.name: SVRCLU-MIB::svrCluMemberName

description: Generated when a cluster member is deleted

Summary.eval: ($v2 eq '') ? 'Member deleted from cluster' : 'Host $v2 deleted from cluster'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SVRCLU-MIB::svrCluMemberDeleted SVRCLU-MIB::svrCluMemberIndex i 9999 SVRCLU-MIB::svrCluMemberName s EXAMPLE

description: A unique index for the entry. Values of svrCluMemberIndex must
remain constant at least between reboots of the network management
system on the managed node. Where possible, this value should
reflect the system's native member identifier.
variables.name: SVRCLU-MIB::svrCluMemberIndex

description: The host name of this cluster member. A zero-length value means
the member's host name is unknown. This name may not necessarily
variables.name: SVRCLU-MIB::svrCluMemberName
